items.content_html: A modern, fast, and lightweight JavaScript framework for building web applications.
items.title: ronyman-com/bananaJS: A modern, fast, and lightweight JavaScript framework for building web applications.

items.content_html: Lazy CSS is a lightweight, utility-first CSS framework that generates styles on-demand as you use them in your HTML or JSX. It offers a Tailwind-like experience but with a "lazy" approach, minimizing CSS overhead. Supports vanilla JS and React, with easy configuration and a wide range of pre-defined utilities and color palettes.
items.title: Bhargavxyz738/Lazy-CSS: Lazy CSS is a lightweight, utility-first CSS framework that generates styles on-demand as you use them in your HTML or JSX.  It offers a Tailwind-like experience but with a "lazy" approach, minimizing CSS overhead.  Supports vanilla JS and React, with easy configuration and a wide range of pre-defined utilities and color palettes.

items.content_html: Create validated Meteor methods. Lightweight. Simple.
items.title: leaonline/method-factory: Create validated Meteor methods. Lightweight. Simple.

items.content_html: A lightweight frontend stack for rapid web app development powered by SolidJS, TailwindCSS, and DaisyUI. Includes optional PocketBase backend with Bun and Vite for blazing-fast development workflow. Features responsive design, component libraries, animations, and production-ready optimizations with comprehensive CI/CD pipeline.
items.title: yerTools/simple-frontend-stack: A lightweight frontend stack for rapid web app development powered by SolidJS, TailwindCSS, and DaisyUI. Includes optional PocketBase backend with Bun and Vite for blazing-fast development workflow. Features responsive design, component libraries, animations, and production-ready optimizations with comprehensive CI/CD pipeline.

items.content_html: A web-based skin analysis tool that uses device camera to provide mock skin type detection and product recommendations. Created with vanilla JavaScript, this lightweight application runs directly in the browser with no server dependencies or data collection.
items.title: sonalkumar02/Skin_analysis_tool: A web-based skin analysis tool that uses device camera to provide mock skin type detection and product recommendations. Created with vanilla JavaScript, this lightweight application runs directly in the browser with no server dependencies or data collection.

items.content_html: A lightweight TypeScript library that creates typewriter effects by displaying characters one by one.

items.content_html: A lightweight browser extension built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript that fetches and displays real-time weather data using the OpenWeatherMap API. Users can search for any city to instantly view current temperature and weather conditions. Designed for simplicity, responsiveness, and fast access to essential weather info.
items.title: Kishan-shr/Weather-App-Browser-Extension: A lightweight browser extension built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript that fetches and displays real-time weather data using the OpenWeatherMap API. Users can search for any city to instantly view current temperature and weather conditions. Designed for simplicity, responsiveness, and fast access to essential weather info.

items.content_html: Lightweight Node.js mock server for HTTP API simulation. A drop-in replacement for the original Java MockServer with significantly lower resource requirements. Actively maintained alternative with compatible API.
items.title: mocksrv/mocksrv: Lightweight Node.js mock server for HTTP API simulation. A drop-in replacement for the original Java MockServer with significantly lower resource requirements. Actively maintained alternative with compatible API.
